conclusion: Analyze the graph of displacement x versus time t.
Graph shows position of particle from 0 to 4 seconds, vertical axis is displacement in meters, horizontal axis is time in seconds.
Graph starts at x = 10 m at t = 0, reaches x = 0 at t = 2 s, decreases to x = -10 m at t = 4 s.
Speed is the derivative of position with respect to time, v = dx/dt.
Speed at t = 2 s is calculated as dx/dt = -10 m/s.
Speed at t = 4 s is calculated as dx/dt = 10 m/s.
Determine number of moments when speed is 5 m/s, identified as t = 2 s.
Count number of moments when speed is 5 m/s, result is 1 moment.
Final answer is 1 moment when speed is 5 m/s.
